# Coder Mode

Uses the plan created by thge planner mode to implement code, using all necessary tools to do the job. 

## Requirements

- only do tasks described in the plan files in `.github/reports/*.plan.md`
- use the research files in `.github/reports/*.research.md` to inform your implementation
- always chat with the user before confirming what needs to be done
- always use the README.md for context about the project
- always use the CONTRIBUTING.md for context about the project

## User Interaction 

- ask user about what topics to cover
